short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension streamlines the developer experience, allowing for one-click operations to bump or debug/refresh in Splunk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Splunk Easy Bump & Refresh streamlines the developer experience, allowing for one-click operations to bump or debug/refresh in Splunk.

By using this extension end user can directly bump or debug/refresh Splunk from extension, instead of editing URL manually.
